extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Splunk Products and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the installed Splunk products and versions are affected by the vulnerabilities listed in the advisory.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are the installed Splunk products and versions affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Splunk Products
extracted_playbook.description: Update affected versions of Splunk Enterprise, Splunk Cloud Platform, Splunk App for Lookup File Editing, and Splunk App for Stream to the latest versions to mitigate vulnerabilities.

affected_products: Splunk App for Lookup File Editing versions <4.0.1
